Episodes.Title: Bender's Big Score: Part 1
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Ken Keeler
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: The crew fall for a scam while relaxing on the Nude Beach planet and end up losing both Planet Express and Bender. While Hermes has a nasty accident and Nibbler summons the Nibblonian forces to try save the day.

Episodes.Title: Bender's Big Score: Part 2
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Ken Keeler
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: The scammers start using time travel to steal valuable items from the past, Professor Farnsworth enlists the Globetrotters' help, Zoidberg tries to help Hermes recover, Leela goes on a date, and Bender is sent back in time to kill...

Episodes.Title: Bender's Big Score: Part 3
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Ken Keeler
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Fry lives his alternate life in the past, Bender returns to the crew having been released by the scammers. Hermes has another accident and Leela gets engaged during a rampage by Robot Santa, but will the wedding go smoothly.

Episodes.Title: The Beast with a Billion Backs: Part 1
Episodes.Plot: Amy and Kif have a ceremony to become part of the same clan and Fry moves in with his new girlfriend discovering she has a very differing lifestyle to his. While the Earth's scientists debate what to do about the rift in space.

Episodes.Title: The Beast with a Billion Backs: Part 2
Episodes.Plot: Bender starts stalking Calculon and ends up introduced to a special group. A depressed Fry enters the rift, while Farnsworth teams up with rival Wernstrom to collaborate on the rift problem. And tragedy strikes close to home for t...

Episodes.Title: The Beast with a Billion Backs: Part 3
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Eric Kaplan
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: A tentacle monster bursts forth from the rift with Fry as it's mouthpiece and it intends to join with all people on Earth. The Planet Express crew plan to stop the takeover and rescue Fry but can they succeed and will Bender help ...

Episodes.Title: The Beast with a Billion Backs: Part 4
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Eric Kaplan
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Bender takes control of the League of Robots and makes a deal with the Robot Devil for an army. While everyone else makes a deal with Yivo to get along together, but things don't go smoothly for long when Bender attacks.

Episodes.Title: Bender's Game: Part 1
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Eric Horsted
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Leela has to work on her anger issues after being goaded into entering a Space Demolition Derby with the Planet Express ship and Bender has to work on his lack of imagination after seeing the kids have fun playing Dungeons and Dra...

Episodes.Title: Bender's Game: Part 2
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Eric Horsted
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: The Planet Express crew learn Mom is profiting by creating a fake shortage of Dark Matter and set out to stop her but can the Professor recall where he put an important energy crystal. And Bender undergoes therapy at a Robot Insan...

Episodes.Title: Bender's Game: Part 3
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Eric Kaplan
Episodes.Plot: When Bender's out of control imagination mixes with the Die of Power it creates an alternate Lord of the Rings influenced universe where the Planet Express crew must go on a journey across strange lands to destroy the Die of Power.

Episodes.Title: Bender's Game: Part 4
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Patric M. Verrone
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: The Planet Express crew continue their journey to destroy the Die of Power, which has a negative effect on Fry. Mom and her sons make a last gambit to get the Die for themselves and Leela tries to convince the Centaurs to join the...

Episodes.Title: Into the Wild Green Yonder: Part 1
Episodes.Plot: When a new Mars Vegas is built, the crew wrangle invites to the opening weekend and the 3009 Universal Poker Championship. Fry discovers he has a new ability to read people's thoughts and Bender starts a secret affair with Donbot'...

Episodes.Title: Into the Wild Green Yonder: Part 2
Episodes.Plot: Leo Wong is building a galaxy sized miniature golf course regardless of the damage it causes, so Leela joins some protesters to oppose him, while Fry joins a group with the same goal of stopping Leo, but President Nixon has other ...

Episodes.Title: Into the Wild Green Yonder: Part 3
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Ken Keeler
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, John DiMaggio, Tress MacNeille
Episodes.Plot: Bender and Zapp Brannigan team up to capture Leela by using an unwitting Fry. Fry learns more about the Dark Ones, who strike at a new victim. And the Nimbus chases the Feministas across the miniature golf course galaxy.

Episodes.Title: Into the Wild Green Yonder: Part 4
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Ken Keeler
Episodes.Plot: The Feministas face the Supreme Court over their 'crimes' but Bender has his own ideas about their fate. As Leo Wong prepares to destroy the Violet Dwarf Star, Fry must decide what the right thing to do is. Then the Dark One arrives.
